languages.text: "Нет, дознаватель ван Калокс". {n}Голос саванта едва слышен.{/n} "Я не имею намерения скрывать эту информацию от вас. Я практически уверена, что Танакия Калбергария была устранена по приказу Ксавьера Калькасара как ненадежный элемент".

"No, Interrogator van Calox." {n}The Sage's voice is scarcely louder than a whisper.{/n} "I have no intention of concealing that information from you. I am almost certain that Tanakia Calbergaria was eliminated on the orders of Xavier Calcazar after being deemed a volatile element."
languages.original_text: "Нет, дознаватель ван Калокс". {n}Голос саванта едва слышен.{/n} "Я не имею намерения скрывать эту информацию от вас. Я практически уверена, что Танакия Калбергария была устранена по приказу Ксавьера Калькасара как ненадежный элемент".

traits.locale_text: "No, Interrogator van Calox." {n}The Sage's voice is scarcely louder than a whisper.{/n} "I have no intention of concealing that information from you. I am almost certain that Tanakia Calbergaria was eliminated on the orders of Xavier Calcazar — she was deemed a volatile element after her assignment on the von Valancius voidship was complete."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

I am almost certain that Tanakia Calbergaria was eliminated on the orders of Xavier Calcazar after being deemed a volatile element."

languages.text: “没必要，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官。”{n}艾米莉娜的声音如同耳语一般。{/n}“我无意向你隐瞒这些信息。我几乎可以肯定，塔娜基娅·卡贝加利亚是在希维尔·卡尔卡扎的授意之下被除掉的，大审判官认为她是个不稳定因素。”
languages.original_text: "No, Interrogator van Calox." {n}The Sage's voice is scarcely louder than a whisper.{/n} "I have no intention of concealing that information from you. I am almost certain that Tanakia Calbergaria was eliminated on the orders of Xavier Calcazar after being deemed a volatile element."

traits.locale_text: “没必要，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官。”{n}艾米莉娜的声音如同耳语一般。{/n}“我无意向你隐瞒这些信息。我几乎可以肯定，塔娜基娅·卡贝加利亚是在希维尔·卡尔卡扎的授意之下被除掉的。她在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的虚空舰上完成任务之后，审判长便认为她是个不稳定因素。”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: «No, interrogador van Calox». {n}La voz de la sabia es prácticamente un susurro.{/n} «No tengo intención de ocultarle esa información. Estoy casi segura de que Tanakia Calbergaria fue eliminada bajo órdenes de Xavier Calcazar al ser considerada un elemento inestable».
languages.original_text: "No, Interrogator van Calox." {n}The Sage's voice is scarcely louder than a whisper.{/n} "I have no intention of concealing that information from you. I am almost certain that Tanakia Calbergaria was eliminated on the orders of Xavier Calcazar after being deemed a volatile element."

traits.locale_text: «No, interrogador van Calox». {n}La voz de la sabia es prácticamente un susurro.{/n} «No tengo intención de ocultarle esa información. Estoy casi segura de que Tanakia Calbergaria fue eliminada bajo órdenes de Xavier Calcazar; desde que completó su misión en la nave del vacío von Valancius, se la consideró como un elemento volátil».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: 「いいえ、インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックス」{n}賢者は、ささやき声よりわずかに大きな声で告げる。{/n}「私は、その情報をあなたから隠すつもりはありません。私はタナキア・カルベルガリアがザビエル・カルカサルに不安定要素とみなされ、命令によって排除されたとほぼ確信している」
languages.original_text: "No, Interrogator van Calox." {n}The Sage's voice is scarcely louder than a whisper.{/n} "I have no intention of concealing that information from you. I am almost certain that Tanakia Calbergaria was eliminated on the orders of Xavier Calcazar after being deemed a volatile element."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックス」{n}賢者は、ささやき声よりわずかに大きな声で告げる。{/n}「私は、その情報をあなたから隠すつもりはありません。私はタナキア・カルベルガリアがザビエル・カルカサルに不安定要素とみなされ、命令によって排除されたとほぼ確信している」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}La voix de la sage est à peine plus forte qu'un murmure.{/n} « Non, interrogateur van Calox. Je n'ai pas l'intention de vous cacher ces informations. Je suis presque certaine que Tanakia Calbergaria a été éliminée sur l'ordre de Xavier Calcazar après avoir été jugée trop instable. »
languages.original_text: "No, Interrogator van Calox." {n}The Sage's voice is scarcely louder than a whisper.{/n} "I have no intention of concealing that information from you. I am almost certain that Tanakia Calbergaria was eliminated on the orders of Xavier Calcazar after being deemed a volatile element."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de la sage est à peine plus forte qu'un murmure.{/n} « Non, interrogateur van Calox. Je n'ai pas l'intention de vous cacher ces informations. Je suis presque certaine que Tanakia Calbergaria a été éliminée sur l'ordre de Xavier Calcazar. Elle était considérée comme un élément instable après son affectation sur le vaisseau von Valancius. »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Nein, Interrogator van Calox." {n}Die Stimme des Weisen ist kaum lauter als ein Flüstern.{/n} "Ich habe nicht vor, diese Information vor Euch zu verbergen. Ich bin mir fast sicher, dass Tanakia Calbergaria auf Befehl von Xavier Calcazar eliminiert wurde, weil sie als volatiles Element angesehen wurde."
languages.original_text: "No, Interrogator van Calox." {n}The Sage's voice is scarcely louder than a whisper.{/n} "I have no intention of concealing that information from you. I am almost certain that Tanakia Calbergaria was eliminated on the orders of Xavier Calcazar after being deemed a volatile element."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Interrogator van Calox." {n}Die Stimme der Weisen ist kaum lauter als ein Flüstern.{/n} "Ich habe nicht die Absicht, Euch diese Information vorzuenthalten. Ich bin fast sicher, dass Tanakia Calbergaria auf Befehl von Xavier Calcazar eliminiert wurde – sie galt als unsicheres Element, nachdem ihr Auftrag auf dem Raumschiff derer von Valancius abgeschlossen war."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Hayır Sorgucu van Calox." {n}Âlim'in sesi, fısıltıya çok yakın bir seviyede çıkıyor.{/n} "Bu bilgiyi senden gizleme niyetinde değilim. Tanakia Calbergaria'nın tehlikeli bir unsur olarak addedildiğine ve Xavier Calcazar'ın emriyle ortadan kaldırıldığına neredeyse eminim."
languages.original_text: "No, Interrogator van Calox." {n}The Sage's voice is scarcely louder than a whisper.{/n} "I have no intention of concealing that information from you. I am almost certain that Tanakia Calbergaria was eliminated on the orders of Xavier Calcazar after being deemed a volatile element."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır Sorgucu van Calox." {n}Âlim'in sesi fısıltıdan yalnızca birazcık daha yüksek.{/n} "Bu bilgiyi senden gizleme niyetinde değilim. Tanakia Calbergaria'nın tehlikeli bir unsur olarak addedildiğine ve Xavier Calcazar'ın emriyle ortadan kaldırıldığına neredeyse eminim."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
